title: 이달의소녀탐구 #87 (LOONA TV #87)
summary:
Filming at the running track in New Zealand. So much running.
0:07 -- All four girls practice batton passing for their relay race. Hyujin coaches them not to look back for the batton, but all of them look back.
0:23 -- “My Knee turned red” HeeJin classic pouty face.
0:32 -- HyunJin looks off longingly and proclaims, “When are we going to stop running?” HyunJin has a bug on her nose for this proclamation.
0:35 -- Camera operator HeeJin.
